description.value:
Psychic

Aura 10; while the mind flayer mastermind is not bloodied, enemies in the aura take a -2 penalty to Will defense.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

+21 vs AC; 3d6+3 damage, and the target is grabbed (until escape).

At-Will ✦ see text

Standard

Grabbed or stunned target only; +21 vs Fortitude; 4d10+3 damage, and the target is stunned (save ends). If this power reduces the target to 0 hit points or fewer, the mind flayer mastermind can either devour its brain or turn it into a thrall (see below):

Devour Brain (Healing): The mind flayer mastermind devours the target's brain. The target is killed instantly, and the mind flayer mastermind regains 25 hit points.

Create Thrall (Charm): The target is dominated (no save) and regains enough hit points to restore it to its bloodied value. As a thrall, the target is immune to the mind blast power of mind flayers and gains a +5 bonus to its Will defense while within 10 squares of the controlling mind flayer mastermind. The target is no longer dominated and no longer a thrall once the controlling mastermind dies.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Psychic

Standard

Close blast 5

Mind flayers and their thralls are immune; +21 vs Will; 3d8+7 psychic damage, and the target is dazed (save ends). Miss: Half damage, and the target is not dazed.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Charm

Standard

Ranged 10

+21 vs Will; the target is dominated (save ends). While dominated, the target is immune to the mind blast power of mind flayers and gains a +5 bonus to its Will defense while within 10 squares of the controlling mind flayer mastermind. The mastermind can use enslave only on one creature at a time.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Illusion, Psychic

Standard

The targets imagine that the area is filled with writhing, barbed tentacles

Area burst 1 within 10; targets enemies within the burst; +27 vs Will; 2d10+6 psychic damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 psychic damage and is immobilized (save ends both).

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Teleportation

Immediate Interrupt

Trigger: When attacked

The mind flayer mastermind teleports 20 squares.

At-Will

Immediate Interrupt

Trigger: When targeted by a melee attack

The mastermind redirects the attack to an adjacent thrall.

system.biography:
HP 324; Bloodied 162Init +12 | AP 1 | Save +2
AC 33Fort 33Ref 33Will 35
Speed 7
Ability ScoresStr 11 (+9)
Con 18 (+13)		Dex 16 (+12)
Int 18 (+13)		Wis 18 (+13)
Cha 24 (+16)
Languages Deep Speech, telepathy 10
Alignment Evil
Skills Arcana +18, Bluff +21, Insight +18, Intimidate +21Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 23 | Insight 28
